title: Asian bbq chicken
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons soy sauce', '5 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 tablespoons orange juice', '1 tablespoon sweet chilli sauce', '1 teaspoon chilli-garlic sauce (such as Sriracha)', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1/4 teaspoon curry powder', '4 skinless, boneless chicken thighs']
